numbers🧚‍♀️ I was so sad because I really wanted to support him but I don’t have a number but I can still contact people 😭😪 I was so upset that i bought a plane ticket to White House there were hundreds✨💅🧚‍♀️of guards but I knocked one of them unconscious and stole their uniform 💅✨🧚🏾‍♂️🧚🏾i was so close to confronting trump but melania and trump jr caught me luckily they were on my side and didn’t want me too get caught they were able to sneak me into trumps room 🧚🏾🧚‍♀️✨once I got in their I started yelling at him because how dare he not let me see anymore and not use his app cause I don’t have a phone number but Trump (🤡 aka this emoji) wasn’t very smart so he didn’t know what was going on ✨🧚‍♀️I demanded him to fix the app but he just stood there I was so angry that I smashed his entire office and bedroom✨🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚🏾✨also accidentally destroying the app Trump was furious but all I had to do was tip him over and he was out I left and took melania and trump he with me so they could have a better life but one month later trump came to our hideout he had spent the past month plotting how to get his family back but I wouldn’t have it ✨🧚‍♀️🧚🏾‍♂️I told melania and trump jr to weakness the fact his body is slanted he had tried to straighten his spine but he had failed so I defeated him the same way I did before 💅🧚‍♀️✨✨🧚‍♀️but this time he fell in a really deep hole and was
